summary: RETEST PASSED: App.tsx routing fix verified. All /app/* pages now consistently use dark sidebar (EkaAppShell). Previously /app/job-cards, /app/invoices, /app/settings were showing light sidebar due to duplicate route definitions in AppShell block - now fixed.
passed_tests: Navigation via sidebar maintains correct shell ✓
Direct URL navigation maintains correct shell ✓
TopBar consistent (white background) across all pages ✓
critical_code_review_comments: App.tsx routing fix applied correctly - /app/* routes now handled exclusively by EkaAppRoutes (line 65)
Legacy routes (without /app prefix) remain in AppShell block for backwards compatibility
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sidebar theme inconsistency FIXED. All /app/* pages now correctly use EkaAppShell with dark sidebar (#0D0D0D). The fix was removing duplicate /app/* routes from the AppShell block in App.tsx. EkaAppRoutes now exclusively handles all /app/* routes.
